/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the gray, overcast sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in soft light. Cars of different shapes and colors are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's architectural diversity and the constant movement of its inhabitants.
